description: The construction of a four storey building, incorporating balconies, on the site of 104-120 Lee High Road SE13, comprising a retail store (1,752 mÂ²) (Use Class A1) on the ground floor and 35 one bedroom, 20 two bedroom and 2 three bedroom, self-contained flats above, together with associated landscaping, provision of an amenity area, service area, bin stores, 74 cycle spaces and 72 car parking spaces with access onto Lee High Road.
